About Us

Switch Music is a Italian-based techno & electronic organization.
Formed in Bologna in 2009 as a collective of artists and party designers,
we now work as records label and booking agency.

Contact /
Booking

Request about Artists and Label

Feel free to send us a download link (mp3 320Kb)
or private SoundCloud link of your music to:
info@switchmusic.it





For booking requests please
use the address below:
